name: Fractal Trees (bcortizo)
description:
Pequeno experimento com árvores fractais.
Use as teclas 'W' e 'S' para alterar o ângulo dos galhos.

Feito em Lua + Löve2D

Adaptado de e inspirado por:
https://thecodingtrain.com/CodingChallenges/014-fractaltree.html

-- English
Little fractal trees experiment.
Use the 'W' and 'S' keys to change branch angles.

Made in Lua + Löve2D

Adapted from and inspired by:
https://thecodingtrain.com/CodingChallenges/014-fractaltree.html
